commandDescription: Run UTAM test by specifying a WDIO configuration. Test specs to run can be explicitly specified by using a flag.
configFlagDescription: Specify a path to WDIO config file with UTAM configuration.
specFlagDescription: Specify a path to a test spec or a folder with test specs.
error:configFileDoesntExistDescription: WDIO config file doesn't exist at the specified path.
error:specPathInvalidDescription: A test spec or a folder containing test specs was not found at the specified path.
